name: Sarwar
text: Alif. Lam. Ra. These are the verses of the Book and the glorious Quran.

name: Sarwar
text: How strongly the unbelievers will wish that they had been Muslims.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), leave them alone to eat and enjoy themselves and let their desires deceive them; they will soon know (the Truth).

name: Sarwar
text: We never destroyed any town without pre-ordaining the fate of its people.

name: Sarwar
text: Every nation can only live for the time appointed for it.

name: Sarwar
text: (The unbelievers have said), "You to whom the Quran has been revealed are insane.

name: Sarwar
text: Why do you not bring down the angels if what you say is true".

name: Sarwar
text: We do not send down angels except for a genuine purpose, at which time none will be given any further respite.

name: Sarwar
text: We Ourselves have revealed the Quran and We are its Protectors.

name: Sarwar
text: We sent Messengers to the ancient people who lived before you.

name: Sarwar
text: No Messenger went to them whom they did not mock.

name: Sarwar
text: This is how We cause the hearts of the guilty ones to behave.

name: Sarwar
text: They do not believe in the Truth and they exactly follow the tradition of the ancient (unbelievers)

name: Sarwar
text: Had We opened a door for them in the sky through which they could easily pass,

name: Sarwar
text: they would have said, "Our eyes are bewildered and we have been affected by magic."

name: Sarwar
text: We have made constellations in the sky and decorated them for the onlookers.

name: Sarwar
text: We have protected them from every condemned devil,

name: Sarwar
text: except for those who stealthily try to listen to the heavens, but who are chased away by a bright flame.

name: Sarwar
text: We have spread out the earth, fixed mountains thereupon and caused everything to grow to its proper weight

name: Sarwar
text: to provide you and those for whose sustenance you are not responsible, with the necessities of life.

name: Sarwar
text: With Us is the source of everything and We do not send it down except in a known quantity.

name: Sarwar
text: We send impregnating winds and send down water from the sky for you to drink and you have no (control over its) storage.

name: Sarwar
text: It is We who give life and cause things to die and We are the sole Heirs.

name: Sarwar
text: We know the people who lived before you and those who will come into existence after you.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord will resurrect them all; He is All-wise and All-knowing.

name: Sarwar
text: We have created the human being out of pure mud-moulded clay

name: Sarwar
text: and the jinn before (the human being) of smokeless fire.

name: Sarwar
text: When your Lord said to the angels, "I will create the human being out of pure mud-moulded clay.

name: Sarwar
text: When it is properly shaped and I have blown My Spirit into it, you should then bow down in prostration".

name: Sarwar
text: All the angels prostrated before Adam

name: Sarwar
text: except Iblis who refused to join with the others in prostration.

name: Sarwar
text: God asked Iblis, "What made you not join the others in prostration?"

name: Sarwar
text: Iblis replied, "I did not want to prostrate before a human being whom You have created out of mud-moulded clay".

name: Sarwar
text: God told him, "Get out of the garden; you are rejected

name: Sarwar
text: and will be subjected to condemnation until the Day of Judgment."

name: Sarwar
text: Iblis prayed, "Lord, grant me respite until the Day of Judgment".

name: Sarwar
text: The Lord said, "Your request is granted

name: Sarwar
text: for an appointed time."

name: Sarwar
text: Iblis said, "Lord, because you have caused me to go astray, I shall make earthly things attractive to (people) and mislead all of them

name: Sarwar
text: except Your sincere servants".

name: Sarwar
text: God said, "The path which leads to Me is a straight

name: Sarwar
text: and you have no authority over My servants except the erring ones who follow you.

name: Sarwar
text: Hell is the promised place for them all.

name: Sarwar
text: It has seven gates and each gate is assigned for a certain group of people.

name: Sarwar
text: The pious will live in gardens with streams

name: Sarwar
text: and they will be told to enter there in peace and safety.

name: Sarwar
text: We shall remove all hatred from their breasts and make them as brothers reclining on thrones facing one another.

name: Sarwar
text: No fatigue will touch them nor will they be expelled therefrom."

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), tell My servants that I am All-forgiving and All-merciful

name: Sarwar
text: and that My punishment is a painful one.

name: Sarwar
text: Tell them about the guests of Abraham

name: Sarwar
text: who came to him saying, "Peace be with you." Abraham said, "We are afraid of you".

name: Sarwar
text: They replied, "Do not be afraid. We have brought you the glad news of (the birth) of a learned son".

name: Sarwar
text: Abraham asked, "Are you giving me the glad news of a son in my old age? What reason can you give for such glad news?"

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "We have given you the glad news for a true reason so do not despair".

name: Sarwar
text: He said, "No one despairs of the mercy of his Lord except those who are in error.

name: Sarwar
text: Messengers, what is your task?"

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "We are sent to a sinful people.

name: Sarwar
text: Only the family of Lot will all be saved,

name: Sarwar
text: except his wife who is doomed to be left behind."

name: Sarwar
text: When the Messengers came to the family of Lot,

name: Sarwar
text: he said, "You seem to be strangers".

name: Sarwar
text: They replied, "We have come to you about the matter which the (unbelievers) have rejected.

name: Sarwar
text: We have come to you for a genuine purpose and We are true in what we say.

name: Sarwar
text: Leave the town with your family sometime during the night. Walk behind them and let no one turn around. Proceed as you are commanded."

name: Sarwar
text: We informed him that the unbelievers would be utterly destroyed.

name: Sarwar
text: The people of the town rejoicingly

name: Sarwar
text: rushed towards the house of Lot. Lot said to them, "These are my guests. Do not disgrace me.

name: Sarwar
text: Have fear of God and do not humiliate me".

name: Sarwar
text: They replied, "Did we not forbid you to bring anyone to your house?"

name: Sarwar
text: Lot said, "These are my daughters if you want them."

name: Sarwar
text: By your life! In their drunkenness they were truly blind.

name: Sarwar
text: An explosion struck them at sunrise.

name: Sarwar
text: We turned the town upside-down and showered on them lumps of baked clay.

name: Sarwar
text: In this there is evidence (of the Truth) for the prudent ones.

name: Sarwar
text: That town lies on a road which still exists.

name: Sarwar
text: In this there is evidence (of the Truth) for the believers.

name: Sarwar
text: Since the People of the Forest were unjust,

name: Sarwar
text: We afflicted them with punishment. Both people had clear (divine) authority among them.

name: Sarwar
text: People of Hijr rejected the Messengers.

name: Sarwar
text: We showed them miracles but they ignored them.

name: Sarwar
text: They would carve secure houses out of the mountains.

name: Sarwar
text: An explosion struck them in the morning.

name: Sarwar
text: Out of what they had gained, nothing proved to be of any benefit to them.

name: Sarwar
text: We have created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, for a genuine purpose. The Day of Judgment will certainly approach, so (Muhammad) forgive them graciously.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord is certainly the All-knowing Creator.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), We have given you the seven most repeated (verses) and the great Quran.

name: Sarwar
text: Do not yearn for other people's property and wives and do not grieve (that they do not believe). Be kind to the believers.

name: Sarwar
text: Say, "Indeed, I am simply one who warns."

name: Sarwar
text: (We have given you the Quran) as We had given (the Bible) to those who divided themselves into groups

name: Sarwar
text: and also divided the Quran believing in some parts and rejecting others.

name: Sarwar
text: By the Lord, We will hold them all responsible

name: Sarwar
text: for what they have done

name: Sarwar
text: Preach what you have been commanded to and stay away from the pagans.

name: Sarwar
text: We shall help you against those who mock you

name: Sarwar
text: and believe other things to be equal to God. They will soon know the truth.

name: Sarwar
text: We certainly know that you feel sad about what they say against you.

name: Sarwar
text: Glorify and praise your Lord and be with those who prostrate themselves before God.

name: Sarwar
text: Worship your Lord until you achieve the ultimate certainty.
